r.d: With Parle, it is possible to implement lexing and parsing in PHP while relying on features and principles of the parser/lexer generator tools for C/C++.
r.n: - Fixed reflection properties allocation (Remi Collet) - Removed offset from the Token class - Introduced Lexer properties for marker and cursor positions - Max token id is set to UINT16_MAX to save memory. This might be changed in the future
